trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Perth
There were no other sightings in Perth on or around May 15th 2010
Summary: Looked like a large satellite but it slowed down and stopped.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 7pm 15th May 2010 I witnessed what I thought was a satellite, however it was travelling faster than other's I have seen. As I prepared to video the object with my phone, the object slowed and came to a halt. From the time it started to slow to the time it stopped took 4 to 5 seconds. Once it had stopped it quickly (1 sec) faded from view. The object was about the size and luminosity of Jupiter when you can just make out it's four major moons. Perhaps slightly larger. Upon reviewing the video I could find nothing. The entire sighting lasted about 20 seconds. I searched the internet for satellite information to see if there were any corresponding flyovers for that time but the only one's I could find were well East of my position. The object I saw tracked North to South flying and stopping directly overhead before disappearing. I live in the suburb of Embleton, Perth W.Aust.
